passives.10: +3 MP when in Almighty Mask.
passives.20: Revive instantly with full Health if dead while in Almighty Mask. Once per Battle.

passives.4: Start battle in Caster Mask.
passives.10: Caster Mask applies Regen for 3 turns.
passives.20: Skills cost 1 less MP while in Caster Mask.

passives.4: Free Aim shots spin the Bestial Wheel to a random value.
passives.10: Free Aim shots deal 100% more damage with all Masks except Almighty.
passives.20: 100% Critical Chance while in Almighty Mask.

passives.4: Start battle in Heavy Mask.
passives.10: Heavy Mask applies Shell for 3 turns.
passives.20: +1 MP per hit taken.

passives.4: Start battle in Almighty Mask.
passives.10: 20% increased damage for each consecutive turn without taking damage. Can stack up to 5 times.
passives.20: Break damage is doubled while in Almighty Mask.

passives.4: Start battle in Balanced Mask.
passives.10: Balanced Mask applies Powerful for 3 turns.
passives.20: Critical hits deal 30% more damage while in Balanced Mask.

passives.4: Parries increase the Bestial Wheel by 1. Taking damage resets the Bestial Wheel.
passives.10: Upgraded Skills deal 30% more damage.
passives.20: +1 MP on Mask change.

passives.4: 30% increased damage per Upgraded Skill used. Resets on using a non-Upgraded Skill.
passives.10: Base Attack spins the Bestial Wheel to a random value.
passives.20: Using an Upgraded Skill gives 1 MP to all other allies.

passives.4: Switch to Almighty Mask on Breaking an enemy.
passives.10: Almighty Mask gives 2 MP to all allies.
passives.20: 50% increased Break damage.

passives.4: Free Aim shots can consume 1 Foretell to deal 100% more damage.
passives.10: Base Attack applies 3 Foretell.
passives.20: During Twilight, Free Aim shots deal double damage.

passives.4: Kill self on battle start.
passives.10: Revive with 100% Health. Once per battle.
passives.20: Play first.

passives.4: While having at least 1 active Moon charge, Moon Skills are always Critical but damage taken is doubled.
passives.10: 25% increased damage per Moon charge.
passives.20: Base Attack gives 1 Moon charge.

passives.4: Consuming Foretell applies 2 Burn on target per Sun Charge.
passives.10: 100% increased Burn damage in Twilight state.
passives.20: Sun Skills give one more charge.

passives.4: 100% Critical Chance during Twilight.
passives.10: Apply 1 Foretell on Critical hit.
passives.20: 20% increased damage for each consecutive turn without taking damage. Can stack up to 5 times.

passives.4: Sun Skills always apply 10 Foretell, but all damage taken is doubled.
passives.10: Base Attack gives 1 Moon charge and consumes all Foretell to apply Burn.
passives.20: 100% increased Burn damage in Twilight state.

passives.4: Curse self on battle start. Deal 50% more damage while Cursed.
passives.10: Reset Curse duration when entering Twilight state.
passives.20: Play again when entering Twilight state.

passives.4: +1 MP per Moon charge on turn start.
passives.10: Base Attack gives 1 Moon charge.
passives.20: During Twilight, Base Attack consumes all MP. Base Attack applies 1 Foretell and deals 50% increased damage per MP consumed.

passives.4: While having at least 1 active Sun charge, apply one Burn stack per hit taken.
passives.10: Counterattacks apply 1 Burn per active Sun charge.
passives.20: Base attack can consume 1 Sun charge to apply 5 Foretell.

passives.4: During Twilight, every time Foretell is applied it also affects another random enemy.
passives.10: Apply 1 Burn every 3 Foretell applied with Skills.
passives.20: 20% increased Fire damage with Skills.

passives.4: On Twilight Start, apply Mark to all enemies.
passives.10: Hitting a Marked enemy during Twilight doesn't remove Mark.
passives.20: Apply 3 Foretell on applying Mark.

passives.4: Free Aim shots can consume a Sun charge to apply 5 Foretell and consume a Moon charge to deal 400% more damage.
passives.10: Consuming a Sun or Moon charge gives 1 MP.
passives.20: Base Attack gives 1 Moon charge.

passives.4: During Moon, all allies have Greater Rush. During Sun, all enemies have Greater Slow.
passives.10: During Twilight, all allies have Greater Rush and all enemies have Greater Slow.
passives.20: +3 MP on applying a Buff or Debuff. Once per turn.

passives.4: Killing an enemy with Foretell applies its Foretell to another random enemy.
passives.10: Apply Mark on consuming Foretell.
passives.20: 20% increased Dark damage with Skills.

passives.4: On Twilight Start, deal damage to all enemies based on the amount of charges.
passives.10: On Twilight Start, apply 2 Foretell per charge to all enemies.
passives.20: Double Sun and Moon charge generation.

passives.4: Sun Skills have increased damage for each Foretell on the target. Moon Skills don't generate Moon charges anymore.
passives.10: With at least 1 active Sun charge, gain one additional MP per Foretell consumed.
passives.20: Base attack can consume 1 Sun charge to apply 5 Foretell.

passives.4: During Twilight, all damage dealt is converted to Dark damage.
passives.10: 20% increased Dark damage with Skills.
passives.20: Apply Shell during Moon, Powerful during Sun, and Rush during Twilight.

passives.4: Can consume 1 Moon charge on turn start to recover 20% of each ally's Health.
passives.10: Base Attack gives 1 Moon charge.
passives.20: Moon Skills give one more charge.

passives.4: Recover 5% Health per Foretell applied.
passives.10: Healing Skills cost 1 less MP.
passives.20: 30% increased Heal efficiency per Moon charge. Base Attack gives 1 Moon charge.

passives.4: On turn start, gain 1 Shield if at least 1 Sun charge is active.
passives.10: Apply 5 Foretell on enemies that break Shields.
passives.20: +2 Sun charges on Counterattack.

passives.4: Extend Twilight by one turn on using a Moon Skill. +50% Twilight damage increase on using a Sun Skill.
passives.10: Twilight duration is increased by 1.
passives.20: Play again when entering Twilight state.

gustave-lumiere-assault.name: Lumiere Assault
gustave-lumiere-assault.description: Deals low damage to a single target. 5 hits. Uses weapon element. Critical hits generate 1 additional Charge.

gustave-marking-shot.name: Marking Shot
gustave-marking-shot.description: Deals low Lightning damage to a single target. 1 hit. Applies Mark to the target, making it take +50% damage.

gustave-overcharge.name: Overcharge
gustave-overcharge.description: Deals high Lightning damage based on Charge amount. 1 hit. Can cause Break.

gustave-powerful.name: Powerful
gustave-powerful.description: Applies Empowered to 1-3 allies for 3 turns, increasing damage dealt by 25%. Grants 0-2 random Charges. Requires Lumiere Assault skill.

gustave-recovery.name: Recovery
gustave-recovery.description: Restores 50% of Gustave's max HP and removes all negative status effects. Grants 0-2 random Charges. Requires Powerful skill.

gustave-from-fire.name: From Fire
gustave-from-fire.description: Deals medium damage to a single target using weapon element. 3 hits. If target is Burning, Gustave heals for 20% of max HP. Requires Marking Shot skill.

gustave-shatter.name: Shatter
gustave-shatter.description: Deals high Lightning damage to all enemies. 1 hit. Can cause Break. If a target suffers Break from the hit, Overcharge is fully charged.

gustave-strike-storm.name: Strike Storm
gustave-strike-storm.description: Deals very high damage to a single target. 6 hits. Uses weapon element. Critical hits generate 2 additional Charges.

lune-electrify.name: Electrify
lune-electrify.description: Skill Effect: Deals low Lightning damage to a single target. 3 hits. Consumes Fire to generate a Light stain. Critical hits add an extra hit. Using this skill grants 1 Lightning stain and 1 Light stain.

lune-immolation.name: Immolation
lune-immolation.description: Skill Effect: Deals low Fire damage to a single target and 3 Burns. 1 hit. Consumes Ice to deal increased damage. Using this skill grants 1 Fire stain and 1 Light stain.

lune-ice-lance.name: Ice Lance
lune-ice-lance.description: Skill Effect: Deals medium Ice damage to a single target and Slows the target. 1 hit. Consumes Earth to deal increased damage. Using this skill grants 1 Ice stain and 1 Light stain.

lune-earth-rising.name: Earth Rising
lune-earth-rising.description: Skill Effect: Deals low Earth damage to all enemies. 1 hit. Consumes Lightning to deal increased damage. Using this skill grants 1 Earth stain and 1 Light stain.

lune-thermal-transfer.name: Thermal Transfer
lune-thermal-transfer.description: Skill Effect: Deals low Ice damage to a single target. 2 hits. Gains 4 MP if the target is Burning. Consumes 2 stains of Earth to play a second turn. Using this skill grants 1 Ice stain and 1 Light stain.

lune-thunderfall.name: Thunderfall
lune-thunderfall.description: Skill Effect: Deals medium Lightning damage to random enemies. 2-6 hits. Consumes Fire to deal increased damage. Critical hits add an extra hit. Using this skill grants 1 Lightning stain and 1 Light stain.

lune-wildfire.name: Wildfire
lune-wildfire.description: Skill Effect: Deals medium Fire damage to all enemies. 1 hit. Applies 3 Burns. Consumes 2 stains of Ice to deal increased damage. Using this skill grants 1 Fire stain and 1 Light stain.

lune-mayhem.name: Mayhem
lune-mayhem.description: Skill Effect: Consumes all Stains to deal high elemental damage to the target. Can cause Break if 4 Stains are consumed.

lune-elemental-trick.name: Elemental Trick
lune-elemental-trick.description: Skill Effect: Deals low Ice, Fire, Lightning and Earth damage to a single target. 4 hits. Critical hits generate a Stain corresponding to the element.

lune-elemental-genesis.name: Elemental Genesis
lune-elemental-genesis.description: Skill Effect: Deals extreme damage to all enemies. 8 hits. Each hit deals damage in a random element. Requires Lightning, Earth, Fire and Ice to cast.

lune-crippling-tsunami.name: Crippling Tsunami
lune-crippling-tsunami.description: Skill Effect: Deals medium Ice damage to all enemies. 1 hit. Applies Slow for 3 turns. Consumes all three types of Stains to deal greatly increased damage. Using this skill grants 1 Ice stain and 1 Light stain.

lune-rockslide.name: Rockslide
lune-rockslide.description: Skill Effect: Deals medium Earth damage to a single target. 2 hits. Can cause Break. Consumes all three types of Stains to deal greatly increased damage. Using this skill grants 1 Earth stain and 1 Light stain.

lune-crustal-crush.name: Crustal Crush
lune-crustal-crush.description: Skill Effect: Deals high Earth damage and Break damage to a single target. 5 hits. Consumes 2 stains of Lightning to deal increased damage. Using this skill grants 1 Earth stain and 1 Light stain.

lune-healing-light.name: Healing Light
lune-healing-light.description: Skill Effect: Heals the target ally and dispels Status Effects. Consumes 2 stains of Earth to cost 0 MP. Using this skill grants 1 Light stain.

lune-lightning-dance.name: Lightning Dance
lune-lightning-dance.description: Skill Effect: Deals very high Lightning damage to a single target. 6 hits. Consumes all three types of Stains to deal greatly increased damage. Critical hits add an extra hit. Using this skill grants 1 Lightning stain and 1 Light stain.

lune-storm-caller.name: Storm Caller
lune-storm-caller.description: Skill Effect: All enemies receive medium Lightning damage at the end of the turn and low damage when receiving damage. Duration: 3 turns. Consumes 2 stains of Fire to double lightning attacks at the end of the turn. Using this skill grants 1 Lightning stain and 1 Light stain.

lune-terraquake.name: Terraquake
lune-terraquake.description: Skill Effect: Deals low Earth damage and Break damage to all enemies each turn. Duration: 3 turns. Consumes 2 stains of Lightning to extend the duration to 5 turns. Using this skill grants 1 Earth stain and 1 Light stain.

lune-typhoon.name: Typhoon
lune-typhoon.description: Skill Effect: At the start of the turn, deals high Ice damage to all enemies and heals allies. Consumes 2 stains of Earth to extend the duration from 3 to 5 turns. Using this skill grants 1 Ice stain and 1 Light stain.

lune-rebirth.name: Rebirth
lune-rebirth.description: Skill Effect: Revives an ally with 30-70% of HP and 2 additional MP. Consumes 3 stains of Lightning to cost 0 MP. Using this skill grants 1 Light stain.

lune-revitalization.name: Revitalization
lune-revitalization.description: Skill Effect: Heals 1-3 allies to 40-60% of HP. Consumes 3 stains of Fire to also apply Regeneration for 3 turns. Using this skill grants 1 Light stain.

lune-fire-rage.name: Fire Rage
lune-fire-rage.description: Skill Effect: Deals high increasing Fire damage to all enemies each turn until Lune receives damage. Consumes 2 stains of Ice to deal increased damage. Using this skill grants 1 Fire stain and 1 Light stain.

lune-hell.name: Hell
lune-hell.description: Skill Effect: Deals very high Fire damage applying 5 Burns per hit to all enemies. 2 hits. Consumes all three types of Stains to deal greatly increased damage. Using this skill grants 1 Fire stain and 1 Light stain.

lune-sky-break.name: Sky Break
lune-sky-break.description: Gradient Skill (doesn't consume turn). Deals extreme damage to all enemies. 1 hit. Can cause Break. The element depends on which Stain Lune has more. Using this skill grants 3 stains of Light.

lune-tree-of-life.name: Tree of Life
lune-tree-of-life.description: Gradient Skill (doesn't consume turn). Removes all Status Effects and heals all allies. Using this skill grants 1 Light stain.

lune-tremor.name: Tremor
lune-tremor.description: Gradient Skill (doesn't consume turn). Deals high Earth damage to all enemies. 1 hit. Removes all Shields from enemies. Using this skill grants 1 Earth stain and 1 Light stain.

maelle-offensive-switch.name: Offensive Switch
maelle-offensive-switch.description: Deals low damage to a single target. 1 hit. Uses weapon's element. Applies Defenceless for 3 turns. Using this skill changes Maelle's Stance to Offensive.

maelle-mezzo-forte.name: Mezzo Forte
maelle-mezzo-forte.description: Reapplies current stance and grants 2-4 MP. Deals no damage.

maelle-percee.name: Percee
maelle-percee.description: Deals medium Physical damage to a single target. 1 hit. Damage increased by 50% against Marked targets. Changes to Defensive Stance. Cost reduced to 2 MP if used in Virtuose Stance.

maelle-degagement.name: Degagement
maelle-degagement.description: Deals low Fire damage to a single target. 1 hit. Target becomes vulnerable to Fire damage for 2 turns. Using this skill changes Maelle's Stance to Offensive.

maelle-guard-up.name: Guard Up
maelle-guard-up.description: Choose an ally and roll 1d6. Roll 3-6: Applies Shell to entire team for 3 turns. Roll 1-2: Applies Shell only to chosen target for 3 turns. Using this skill changes Maelle's Stance to Offensive.

maelle-swift-stride.name: Swift Stride
maelle-swift-stride.description: Deals low Physical damage to a single target. 1 hit. Recovers 0-2 MP. If target is Burning, switches to Virtuose Stance.

maelle-guard-down.name: Guard Down
maelle-guard-down.description: Applies Defenceless to all enemies for 3 turns. Using this skill changes Maelle's Stance to Offensive.

maelle-egide.name: Egide
maelle-egide.description: Protects allies by taking damage in their place for 2 turns. Duration extended by 1 turn when gaining Shell. Using this skill changes Maelle's Stance to Defensive.

maelle-spark.name: Spark
maelle-spark.description: Deals low Fire damage to a single target. 1 hit. Applies 3 Burn (5 Burn if used from Offensive Stance). Using this skill changes Maelle's Stance to Defensive.

maelle-rain-of-fire.name: Rain of Fire
maelle-rain-of-fire.description: Deals medium Fire damage to a single target. 2 hits. Applies 3 Burn per hit (5 per hit if used from Defensive Stance). Changes to Offensive Stance.

maelle-combustion.name: Combustion
maelle-combustion.description: Deals medium Physical damage to a single target. 2 hits. Consumes up to 10 Burn for increased damage. Using this skill changes Maelle's Stance to Offensive.

maelle-fleuret-fury.name: Fleuret Fury
maelle-fleuret-fury.description: Deals high Physical damage to a single target. 3 hits. Can cause Break. If Maelle uses this skill while in Virtuose Stance, remains in Virtuose. Using this skill changes Maelle's Stance to Stanceless.

maelle-breaking-rules.name: Breaking Rules
maelle-breaking-rules.description: Deals low Physical damage to a single target. 2 hits. Destroys all target's Shields and grants 1 MP per Shield destroyed. Using this skill changes Maelle's Stance to Offensive.

maelle-fencers-flurry.name: Fencer's Flurry
maelle-fencers-flurry.description: Deals medium damage to all enemies. 1 hit. Uses weapon's element. Applies Defenceless for 1 turn (enemies take 25% increased damage). Using this skill changes Maelle's Stance to Offensive.

maelle-phantom-strike.name: Phantom Strike
maelle-phantom-strike.description: Deals very high Void damage to all enemies. 4 hits. Grants +35% of a Gradient Charge. Using this skill changes Maelle's Stance to Defensive.

maelle-burning-canvas.name: Burning Canvas
maelle-burning-canvas.description: Deals high Void damage to a single target. 5 hits. Applies 1 Burn per hit. Damage increased by +2 for each Burn on the target. Using this skill changes Maelle's Stance to Offensive.

maelle-revenge.name: Revenge
maelle-revenge.description: Deals high Fire damage to a single target. 1 hit. Damage increased for each attack that dealt damage to you since previous turn. Can cause Break. Using this skill changes Maelle's Stance to Defensive.

maelle-pyrolyse.name: Pyrolyse
maelle-pyrolyse.description: Deals extreme Fire damage to a single target. 3 hits. Applies 5 Burn per hit (7 per hit if used from Offensive Stance). Using this skill changes Maelle's Stance to Defensive.

maelle-last-chance.name: Last Chance
maelle-last-chance.description: Reduces own HP to 1 but refills all MP. Using this skill changes Maelle's Stance to Virtuose.

maelle-momentum-strike.name: Momentum Strike
maelle-momentum-strike.description: Deals high Physical damage to a single target. 1 hit. Uses weapon's element. Damage increased against Marked targets. Cost reduced to 4 MP if used in Virtuose Stance (normally 7 MP). Using this skill changes Maelle's Stance to Defensive.

maelle-payback.name: Payback
maelle-payback.description: Deals very high Physical damage to a single target. 1 hit. Can cause Break. MP cost reduced for each attack parried since last turn (base cost 9 MP). Using this skill changes Maelle's Stance to Defensive.

maelle-stendhal.name: Stendhal
maelle-stendhal.description: Deals extreme Void damage to a single target. 1 hit. Removes own Shields and applies Defenceless to self. Using this skill changes Maelle's Stance to Stanceless.

maelle-sword-ballet.name: Sword Ballet
maelle-sword-ballet.description: Deals extreme damage to a single target. 5 hits. Uses weapon's element. Critical Hits deal double damage. If Maelle uses this skill while in Defensive Stance, can be activated. Using this skill changes Maelle's Stance to Defensive.

maelle-gustaves-homage.name: Gustave's Homage
maelle-gustaves-homage.description: Deals high Lightning damage to a single target. 8 hits. Increased damage to Marked targets, doesn't remove Mark.

maelle-virtuose-strike.name: Virtuose Strike
maelle-virtuose-strike.description: Gradient Skill (does not consume turn). Deals high Physical damage to a single target. 5 hits. Using this skill changes Maelle's Stance to Virtuose.

maelle-gommage.name: Gommage
maelle-gommage.description: Gradient Skill (does not consume turn). Kills weak targets. Otherwise deals extreme Void damage to a single target. Using this skill changes Maelle's Stance to Virtuose.

maelle-phoenix-flame.name: Phoenix Flame
maelle-phoenix-flame.description: Gradient Skill (does not consume turn). Applies 10 Burn to all enemies. Revives all allies with 50-70% HP. Using this skill changes Maelle's Stance to Offensive.

sciel-twilight-slash.name: Twilight Slash
sciel-twilight-slash.description: Deals low Dark damage to a single target. 1 hit. Consumes all Foretell to increase damage. Sciel's starting skill.

sciel-focused-foretell.name: Focused Foretell
sciel-focused-foretell.description: Deals medium Physical damage to a single target. 1 hit. Applies 2 Foretell. Applies 3 additional Foretell if target has no Foretell.

sciel-bad-omen.name: Bad Omen
sciel-bad-omen.description: Deals low Dark damage to all enemies. 2 hits. Applies 2 Foretell per hit.

sciel-marking-card.name: Marking Card
sciel-marking-card.description: Deals medium Dark damage to a single target. 2 hits. Applies Mark. Applies 3 Foretell.

sciel-delaying-slash.name: Delaying Slash
sciel-delaying-slash.description: Deals medium damage to a single target. 2 hits. Uses weapon element. Consumes Foretell to increase damage and delay the target's turn.

sciel-dark-cleansing.name: Dark Cleansing
sciel-dark-cleansing.description: Removes all negative status effects from an ally. Propagates buffs from the target to all allies.

sciel-dark-wave.name: Dark Wave
sciel-dark-wave.description: Deals high Dark damage to all enemies. 3 hits. Consumes all Foretell to increase damage.

sciel-grim-harvest.name: Grim Harvest
sciel-grim-harvest.description: Deals medium Dark damage to a single target. 1 hit. Heals all allies for 30% of HP. Consumes Foretell to increase healing by 5% per Foretell.

sciel-harvest.name: Harvest
sciel-harvest.description: Deals medium damage to a single target. 1 hit. Uses weapon element. Heals Sciel for 40% of HP. Consumes all Foretell to increase healing by 5% per Foretell.

sciel-searing-bond.name: Searing Bond
sciel-searing-bond.description: Deals medium Dark damage to a single target. 1 hit. Applies 5 Foretell. Deals damage and applies Foretell to all other Burning enemies.

sciel-phantom-blade.name: Phantom Blade
sciel-phantom-blade.description: Deals high Dark damage to a single target. 1 hit. Consumes all Foretell to increase damage. Can cause Break.

sciel-sealed-fate.name: Sealed Fate
sciel-sealed-fate.description: Deals high damage to a single target. 5-7 hits. Uses weapon element. Each hit can consume 1 Foretell to deal 200% more damage.

sciel-spectral-sweep.name: Spectral Sweep
sciel-spectral-sweep.description: Deals medium damage to a single target. 2-6 hits. Uses weapon element. Applies 1 Foretell per hit. Critical hits apply additional Foretell.

sciel-firing-shadow.name: Firing Shadow
sciel-firing-shadow.description: Deals low Dark damage to all enemies. 3 hits. Consumes 1 Foretell per hit to increase damage.

sciel-fortunes-fury.name: Fortune's Fury
sciel-fortunes-fury.description: An ally of the target deals double damage for 1 turn.

sciel-our-sacrifice.name: Our Sacrifice
sciel-our-sacrifice.description: Deals extreme Dark damage to all enemies. 1 hit. Absorbs HP from allies and Foretell from enemies to increase damage.

sciel-plentiful-harvest.name: Plentiful Harvest
sciel-plentiful-harvest.description: Deals medium Physical damage to a single target. 2 hits. Consumes all Foretell from the target and grants 1 MP to an ally for each Foretell consumed.

sciel-rush.name: Rush
sciel-rush.description: Applies Haste, increasing Speed for 3 turns. Roll 1d6: 1-2 applies to target only, 3-6 applies to all allies.

sciel-all-set.name: All Set
sciel-all-set.description: Applies Protected, Empowered and Hastened to all allies.

sciel-intervention.name: Intervention
sciel-intervention.description: Target ally plays immediately and gains 4 MP.

sciel-card-weaver.name: Card Weaver
sciel-card-weaver.description: Deals low Physical damage to a single target. 1 hit. Redistributes Foretell from the target to all enemies. Grants an extra turn.

sciel-final-path.name: Final Path
sciel-final-path.description: Deals extreme Dark damage to a single target. 1 hit. Applies 10 Foretell. Can cause Break.

sciel-twilight-dance.name: Twilight Dance
sciel-twilight-dance.description: Deals extreme Dark damage to a single target. 4 hits. During Twilight, extends the duration of Twilight by 1 turn. Consumes all Foretell to increase damage.

sciel-shadow-bringer.name: Shadow Bringer
sciel-shadow-bringer.description: Gradient Skill (doesn't consume turn). Deals high Dark damage to random enemies. 10 hits. Applies 1 Foretell per hit.

sciel-doom.name: Doom
sciel-doom.description: Gradient Skill (doesn't consume turn). Deals very high Dark damage to a single target. 3 hits. Applies Weakened, Defenceless and Slowed for 3 turns. Can cause Break.

sciel-end-slice.name: End Slice
sciel-end-slice.description: Gradient Skill (doesn't consume turn). Deals extreme Physical damage to a single target. 1 hit. Damage scales with the amount of Foretell consumed.

verso-angels-eyes.name: Angel's Eyes
verso-angels-eyes.description: Gradient Skill (doesn't consume turn). Deals extreme Physical damage. 8 hits. Gains 1 additional Perfection per hit. Applies Aureole to Verso, reviving him if he dies.

verso-ascending-assault.name: Ascending Assault
verso-ascending-assault.description: Deals low damage to a single target. 1 hit. Uses weapon element. Increases damage with each use. If Verso uses this skill at Perfection Rank S, the MP cost is reduced from 5 to 2.

verso-assault-zero.name: Assault Zero
verso-assault-zero.description: Deals low damage to a single target. 5 hits. Uses weapon element. Critical hits generate 1 additional Perfection. If Verso uses this skill at Perfection Rank B, the damage is increased.

verso-berserk-slash.name: Berserk Slash
verso-berserk-slash.description: Deals medium Physical damage to a single target. 3 hits. Damage increases for each HP that Verso is missing. If Verso uses this skill at Perfection Rank C, the damage is increased.

verso-blitz.name: Blitz
verso-blitz.description: Deals low Physical damage to a single target. 1 hit. Plays a second time. Kills non-boss enemies with less than 10% HP. If Verso uses this skill at Perfection Rank B, the damage is increased.

verso-burden.name: Burden
verso-burden.description: Removes all Status Effects from all allies and applies them to Verso. Gains 1 Rank.

verso-defiant-strike.name: Defiant Strike
verso-defiant-strike.description: Deals high Physical damage to a single target and applies Mark. 2 hits. Costs 30% of current HP. If Verso uses this skill at Perfection Rank B, the damage is increased.

verso-endbringer.name: Endbringer
verso-endbringer.description: Deals extreme Physical damage to a single target. 6 hits. Damage increased if the target is Stunned. If Verso uses this skill at Perfection Rank A, can reapply Stun.

verso-followup.name: Follow Up
verso-followup.description: Deals medium Light damage to a single target. 1 hit. Damage increased for each Free Aim shot this turn, up to 10 times. If Verso uses this skill at Perfection Rank S, the MP cost is reduced from 5 to 2.

verso-from-fire.name: From Fire
verso-from-fire.description: Deals medium damage to a single target. 3 hits. Uses weapon element. Heals Verso for 20% of HP if the target is Burning. If Verso uses this skill at Perfection Rank B, the damage is increased.

verso-leadership.name: Leadership
verso-leadership.description: Reduces current Rank. Gives 2-4 MP to other allies. If Verso uses this skill at Perfection Rank C, gives +1 additional MP to other allies.

verso-light-holder.name: Light Holder
verso-light-holder.description: Deals medium Light damage to a single target. 5 hits. Upon completion, gains 1 Rank. If Verso uses this skill at Perfection Rank A, grants 2 additional MP to Verso.

verso-marking-shot.name: Marking Shot (Verso)
verso-marking-shot.description: Deals low Lightning damage to a single target. 1 hit. Applies Mark.

verso-overload.name: Overload
verso-overload.description: Increases Rank to S and refills all MP, but sets own HP to 1.

verso-paradigm-shift.name: Paradigm Shift
verso-paradigm-shift.description: Deals low Physical damage to a single target and returns 1-3 MP. 3 hits. If Verso uses this skill at Perfection Rank C, grants 1 additional MP to Verso.

verso-perfect-break.name: Perfect Break
verso-perfect-break.description: Deals very high Light damage to a single target. 1 hit. Can cause Break. If Verso uses this skill at Perfection Rank B, the MP cost is reduced from 7 to 5.

verso-perfect-recovery.name: Perfect Recovery
verso-perfect-recovery.description: Recovers 50% of HP and dispels Status Effects. Gives 0-2 Perfection. If Verso uses this skill at Perfection Rank C, the heal effect is increased to 100%.

verso-phantom-stars.name: Phantom Stars
verso-phantom-stars.description: Deals extreme Light damage to all enemies. 5 hits. Can cause Break. If Verso uses this skill at Perfection Rank S, the MP cost is reduced from 9 to 5.

verso-powerful.name: Powerful
verso-powerful.description: Applies Empowered (increases damage) to 1-3 allies for 3 turns. Rolls 1d6: (1-3) only Verso, (4-6) whole team. If Verso uses this skill at Perfection Rank A, the duration increases to 5 turns.

verso-purification.name: Purification
verso-purification.description: Deals medium Light damage to a single target. 2 hits. Dispels own Status Effects. If Verso uses this skill at Perfection Rank B, the damage is increased.

verso-quick-strike.name: Quick Strike
verso-quick-strike.description: Deals low Physical damage to a single target. 1 hit. If Verso uses this skill at Perfection Rank D: Gives more Perfection.

verso-radiant-slash.name: Radiant Slash
verso-radiant-slash.description: Deals low Light damage to all enemies. 1 hit. Can cause Break. If Verso uses this skill at Perfection Rank C, the damage is increased.

verso-sabotage.name: Sabotage
verso-sabotage.description: Gradient Skill (doesn't consume turn). Deals medium Physical damage to all enemies. 1 hit. Applies Mark.

verso-speedburst.name: Speed Burst
verso-speedburst.description: Deals high Light damage to a single target. 5 hits. Damage increased by the Speed difference with the target. If Verso uses this skill at Perfection Rank C, the damage is increased.

verso-steeled-strike.name: Steeled Strike
verso-steeled-strike.description: After 1 turn, deals extreme Physical damage to a single target. 13 hits. Interrupted if receiving any damage. If Verso uses this skill at Perfection Rank S, the damage is increased.

verso-striker.name: Striker
verso-striker.description: Gradient Skill (doesn't consume turn). Deals high Physical damage to a single target. 1 hit. Can cause Break.

verso-strike-storm.name: Strike Storm
verso-strike-storm.description: Deals very high damage to a single target. 6 hits. Uses weapon element. Critical hits generate 2 additional Charges.

monoco-abbest-wind.name: Abbest Wind
monoco-abbest-wind.description:
Wind-based attack. Effect: Deals low Physical damage to a single target. 1 hit. Takes a second turn. Normally costs 2 MP, but when the Bestial Wheel Pointer is positioned on an Agile Mask or Omnipotent Mask, the cost reduces to 0 MP. Using this skill advances the Bestial Wheel Pointer by 2 positions.
Prerequisite: Defeat and acquire the foot of an Abbest enemy while Monoco is in the active group.

monoco-aberration-light.name: Aberration Light
monoco-aberration-light.description:
Aberration light attack. Effect: Deals high Light damage to all enemies. 2 hits. Applies 4 Burns per hit. Agile Mask: Applies 2 additional Burns per hit. Costs 7 MP. Using this skill advances the Bestial Wheel Pointer by 4 positions.
Prerequisite: Defeat and acquire the foot of an Aberration enemy while Monoco is in the active group.

monoco-ballet-charm.name: Ballet Charm
monoco-ballet-charm.description:
Charming ballet-style attack. Effect: Deals low Light damage to a single target. 1 hit. Applies Vulnerable to the target for 3 turns. Increases damage when used with Conjurer Mask equipped. Using this skill advances the Bestial Wheel Pointer by 3 positions.
Prerequisite: Defeat and acquire the foot of a Ballet enemy while Monoco is in the active group.

monoco-benisseur-mortar.name: Benisseur Mortar
monoco-benisseur-mortar.description:
Mortar bombardment attack. Effect: Deals medium Ice damage to a single target. 3 hits. Changes to Omnipotent Mask if the target is Marked. Conjurer Mask: Increased damage.
Prerequisite: Defeat and acquire the foot of a Bnisseur enemy while Monoco is in the active group.

monoco-boucheclier-fortify.name: Boucheclier Fortify
monoco-boucheclier-fortify.description:
Shield fortification skill. Effect: Applies Shell to 1-3 allies for 3 turns. Heavy Mask: Also applies 1 Shield. Using this skill moves the Bestial Wheel Pointer by 5 positions. When the pointer is on Heavy Mask or Omnipotent Mask, grants 1 Shield to affected allies.
Prerequisite: Defeat and acquire the foot of a Boucheclier enemy while Monoco is in the active group.

monoco-braseleur-smash.name: Braseleur Smash
monoco-braseleur-smash.description:
Powerful smashing attack. Effect: Deals medium Fire damage to a single target and applies 3 Burns. 2 hits. Increased damage when the Bestial Wheel Pointer is positioned on Balanced Mask or Omnipotent Mask. Using this skill advances the Bestial Wheel Pointer by 2 positions.
Prerequisite: Defeat and acquire the foot of a Braseleur enemy while Monoco is in the active group.

monoco-break-point.name: Break Point
monoco-break-point.description:
Critical break point attack. Effect: Deals extreme damage to a single target. 1 hit. Uses weapon element. Fills the target's Break Bar and causes Break. Gradient Skill (doesn't consume turn).
Prerequisite: Reach Relationship Level 7 with Monoco.

monoco-bruler-bash.name: Bruler Bash
monoco-bruler-bash.description:
Burning bash attack. Effect: Deals medium Physical damage to a single target. 3 hits. Can cause Break. Increased damage when Conjurer Mask is active. Advances the Bestial Wheel Pointer by 4 positions.
Prerequisite: Defeat and acquire the foot of a Bruler enemy while Monoco is in the active group.

monoco-chalier-combo.name: Chalier Combo
monoco-chalier-combo.description:
Multi-hit combo attack. Effect: Deals high Physical damage to a single target. 6 hits. Interrupted if missed. Increased damage when used with Balanced Mask active.
Prerequisite: Monoco's starting skill, no prerequisite required.

monoco-chapelier-slash.name: Chapelier Slash
monoco-chapelier-slash.description:
Slashing attack. Effect: Deals high Physical damage to all enemies. 3 hits. Applies Mark. Moves the Bestial Wheel Pointer by 4 positions. Increased damage when used while the pointer is on Agile Mask or Omnipotent Mask.
Prerequisite: Defeat and acquire the foot of a Chapelier enemy while Monoco is in the active group.

monoco-chevaliere-ice.name: Chevaliere Ice
monoco-chevaliere-ice.description:
Ice-based knight attack. Effect: Deals high Ice damage to all enemies. 3 hits. Applies Slow to targets for 3 turns. Balanced Mask modifier increases damage when the Bestial Wheel Pointer is positioned on Balanced Mask or Omnipotent Mask.
Prerequisite: Defeat and acquire the foot of a Gold Chevalire enemy while Monoco is in the active group.

monoco-chevaliere-piercing.name: Chevaliere Piercing
monoco-chevaliere-piercing.description:
Piercing knight attack. Effect: Deals Physical damage to a single target piercing through Shields. 6 hits. Increased damage for each Shield on the target. Increased damage when used with Agile Mask equipped.
Prerequisite: Defeat and acquire the foot of a Ceramic Chevalire enemy while Monoco is in the active group.

monoco-chevaliere-thrusts.name: Chevaliere Thrusts
monoco-chevaliere-thrusts.description:
Multiple thrusting attacks. Effect: Deals high Physical damage to all enemies. 3 hits. Critical hits deal double damage. Heavy Mask: Increased damage.
Prerequisite: Defeat and acquire the foot of a Steel Chevalire enemy while Monoco is in the active group.

monoco-clair-enfeeble.name: Clair Enfeeble
monoco-clair-enfeeble.description:
Enfeebling light attack. Effect: Deals medium Light damage to all enemies. 1 hit. Applies Vulnerable for 3 turns. Using while the Bestial Wheel Pointer is on Balanced Mask or Omnipotent Mask increases damage.
Prerequisite: Defeat and acquire the foot of a Clair enemy while Monoco is in the active group.

monoco-contorsionniste-blast.name: Contorsionniste Blast
monoco-contorsionniste-blast.description:
Contortionist explosive blast. Effect: Deals medium Physical damage to all enemies. 1 hit. Heals all allies by 10% HP for each enemy hit. Increased damage when the Bestial Wheel Pointer is positioned on Balanced Mask or Omnipotent Mask.
Prerequisite: Defeat and acquire the foot of a Contorsionniste enemy while Monoco is in the active group.

monoco-creation-void.name: Creation Void
monoco-creation-void.description:
Creates void energy. Effect: Deals extreme Void damage to random targets. 3 hits. Increased damage if the same target is hit multiple times. Receives damage increase when used while the Bestial Wheel Pointer aligns with Conjurer Mask or Omnipotent Mask.
Prerequisite: Defeat and acquire the foot of a Cration enemy while Monoco is in the active group.

monoco-cruler-barrier.name: Cruler Barrier
monoco-cruler-barrier.description:
Protective barrier skill. Effect: Applies 1-2 Shields to the target. Heavy Mask: Grants 2 MP to the target. Using this skill advances the Bestial Wheel Pointer by 4 positions. When activated while the pointer is on Heavy Mask or Omnipotent Mask, grants 2 additional MP to the target.
Prerequisite: Defeat and acquire the foot of a Cruler enemy while Monoco is in the active group.

monoco-cultist-blood.name: Cultist Blood
monoco-cultist-blood.description:
Blood-based cultist attack. Effect: Deals medium Darkness damage to all enemies. 3 hits. Sacrifices 90% HP to increase damage. Heavy Mask: Increased damage. Using this skill advances the Bestial Wheel Pointer by 5 positions.
Prerequisite: Defeat and acquire the foot of a Greatsword Cultist enemy while Monoco is in the active group.

monoco-cultist-slashes.name: Cultist Slashes
monoco-cultist-slashes.description:
Multiple cultist slashing attacks. Effect: Deals medium Darkness damage to a single target. 3 hits. Deals more damage the less HP Monoco has. Increased damage when the Bestial Wheel Pointer aligns with Agile Mask or Omnipotent Mask. Using this skill advances the Bestial Wheel Pointer by 3 positions.
Prerequisite: Defeat and acquire the foot of a Reaper Cultist enemy while Monoco is in the active group.

monoco-danseuse-waltz.name: Danseuse Waltz
monoco-danseuse-waltz.description:
Graceful waltzing attack. Effect: Deals high Fire damage to a single target. 3 hits. Deals more damage against Burning targets. Balanced Mask: Increased damage. Using this skill advances the Bestial Wheel Pointer by 3 positions.
Prerequisite: Defeat and acquire the foot of a Danseuses enemy while Monoco is in the active group.

monoco-demineur-thunder.name: Demineur Thunder
monoco-demineur-thunder.description:
Thunder-based explosive attack. Effect: Deals low Lightning damage to a single target. 1 hit. Deals extra Break damage. Break damage bonus increased when Conjurer Mask is active. Using this skill advances the Bestial Wheel Pointer by 5 positions.
Prerequisite: Defeat and acquire the foot of a Demineur enemy while Monoco is in the active group.

monoco-duallist-storm.name: Duallist Storm
monoco-duallist-storm.description:
Dual-wielding storm attack. Effect: Deals extreme Physical damage to a single target. 4 hits. Can cause Break. Omnipotent Mask: Increased damage. Using this skill advances the Bestial Wheel Pointer by 1 position.
Prerequisite: Defeat and acquire the foot of a Dualliste enemy while Monoco is in the active group.

monoco-echassier-stabs.name: Echassier Stabs
monoco-echassier-stabs.description:
Multiple stabbing attacks. Effect: Deals medium Physical damage to a single target. 2 hits. The second hit applies Mark to the target. Agile Mask: Increased damage. Using this skill advances the Bestial Wheel Pointer by 4 positions.
Prerequisite: Defeat and acquire the foot of an chassier enemy while Monoco is in the active group.

monoco-eveque-spear.name: Eveque Spear
monoco-eveque-spear.description:
Bishop's spear attack. Effect: Deals high Earth damage to a single target and applies Impotent for 3 turns. 1 hit. Increased damage when used with Heavy Mask modifier. Using this skill advances the Bestial Wheel Pointer by 3 positions.
Prerequisite: Defeat and acquire the foot of an vque enemy while Monoco is in the active group.

monoco-gault-fury.name: Gault Fury
monoco-gault-fury.description:
Furious rage attack. Effect: Deals low Physical damage to a single target. 4 hits. Applies Mark. Balanced Mask: Increased damage. Using this skill advances the Bestial Wheel Pointer by 2 positions. When activated while the pointer is on Balanced Mask or Omnipotent Mask, damage increases.
Prerequisite: Defeat and acquire the foot of a Gault enemy while Monoco is in the active group.

monoco-glaise-earthquakes.name: Glaise Earthquakes
monoco-glaise-earthquakes.description:
Earth-shaking earthquake attack. Effect: Deals medium Earth damage to all enemies. 3 hits. Applies Empowered to self. Heavy Mask: applies Empowered to all allies. Using this skill advances the Bestial Wheel Pointer by 6 positions.
Prerequisite: Defeat and acquire the foot of a Glaise enemy while Monoco is in the active group.

monoco-hexga-crush.name: Hexga Crush
monoco-hexga-crush.description:
Crushing hex attack. Effect: Deals medium Earth damage to a single target. 2 hits. Applies Vulnerable to the target for 3 turns. Heavy Mask modifier increases damage. Requires 5 MP to cast and advances the Bestial Wheel Pointer by 6 positions. When used while the pointer is on Heavy Mask or Omnipotent Mask, the debuff duration increases to 5 turns.
Prerequisite: Defeat and acquire the foot of a Hexga enemy while Monoco is in the active group.

monoco-jar-lampstorm.name: Jar Lampstorm
monoco-jar-lampstorm.description:
Lamp jar storm attack. Effect: Deals medium Physical damage to all enemies. 4 hits. Heavy Mask: Increased damage.
Prerequisite: Defeat and acquire the foot of a Jar enemy while Monoco is in the active group.

monoco-lampmaster-light.name: Lampmaster Light
monoco-lampmaster-light.description:
Master lamp light attack. Effect: Deals high Light damage to all enemies. 1 hit. Increased damage with each use. Includes Omnipotent Mask enhancement that provides increased damage. Damage scales with each successive use, reaching maximum after five casts.
Prerequisite: Defeat and acquire the foot of a Lampmaster enemy while Monoco is in the active group.

monoco-lancelier-impale.name: Lancelier Impale
monoco-lancelier-impale.description:
Impaling lance attack. Effect: Deals low Ice damage to a single target. 1 hit. Slows the target for 3 turns. Increased damage when used with Agile Mask enhancement active on the Bestial Wheel Pointer.
Prerequisite: Defeat and acquire the foot of a Lancelier enemy while Monoco is in the active group.

monoco-luster-slices.name: Luster Slices
monoco-luster-slices.description:
Lustrous slicing attacks. Effect: Deals low Physical damage to a single target. 3 hits. Applies Haste to self for 3 turns. Having Agile Mask or Omnipotent Mask active increases damage.
Prerequisite: Defeat and acquire the foot of a Luster enemy while Monoco is in the active group.

monoco-mighty-strike.name: Mighty Strike
monoco-mighty-strike.description:
Powerful mighty strike. Effect: Deals high damage to a single target. 2 hits. Uses weapon element. Deals double damage if the target is Stunned. Goes to Omnipotent Mask.
Prerequisite: Automatically unlocked upon learning the Gradient Attacks/Skills feature, which becomes available as you progress through the story.

monoco-moissonneuse-vendange.name: Moissonneuse Vendange
monoco-moissonneuse-vendange.description:
Harvesting reaper attack. Effect: Deals high Physical damage to a single target. 3 hits. Can cause Break. Increased damage when Balanced Mask or Omnipotent Mask is active on the Bestial Wheel Pointer. Using this skill advances the pointer by 2 positions.
Prerequisite: Defeat and acquire the foot of a Moissoneusse enemy while Monoco is in the active group.

monoco-obscur-sword.name: Obscur Sword
monoco-obscur-sword.description:
Dark shadow sword attack. Effect: Deals high Darkness damage to a single target. 5 hits. Deals more damage against Vulnerable targets. Heavy Mask: Increased damage.
Prerequisite: Defeat and acquire the foot of an Obscur enemy while Monoco is in the active group.

monoco-orphelin-cheers.name: Orphelin Cheers
monoco-orphelin-cheers.description:
Orphan's cheerful buff. Effect: Applies Empowered to 1-3 allies. Conjurer Mask: Also grants 3 MP to targets. Using this skill advances the Bestial Wheel Pointer by 3 positions. When the pointer is on Conjurer Mask or Omnipotent Mask, affected allies receive tripled benefits.
Prerequisite: Defeat and acquire the foot of an Orphelin enemy while Monoco is in the active group.

monoco-pelerin-heal.name: Pelerin Heal
monoco-pelerin-heal.description:
Pilgrim's healing skill. Effect: Applies Regeneration to all allies. Conjurer Mask: also heals 40% HP. Using this skill advances the Bestial Wheel Pointer by 3 positions. When the pointer is on Conjurer Mask or Omnipotent Mask, the team receives a 40% healing increase.
Prerequisite: Defeat and acquire the foot of a Pelerin enemy while Monoco is in the active group.

monoco-portier-crash.name: Portier Crash
monoco-portier-crash.description:
Door-breaking crash attack. Effect: Deals high Physical damage to all enemies. 1 hit. Can cause Break. Heavy Mask: Increased damage.
Prerequisite: Defeat and acquire the foot of a Portier enemy while Monoco is in the active group.

monoco-potier-energy.name: Potier Energy
monoco-potier-energy.description:
Potter's energy skill. Effect: Grants 1-3 MP to all allies. With Conjurer Mask enhancement, provides 1 additional MP. Using this skill advances the Bestial Wheel Pointer by 6 positions. When activated on Conjurer Mask or Omnipotent Mask, allies receive an extra MP.
Prerequisite: Defeat and acquire the foot of a Potier enemy while Monoco is in the active group.

monoco-ramasseur-bonk.name: Ramasseur Bonk
monoco-ramasseur-bonk.description:
Collector's bonking attack. Effect: Deals low Darkness damage to a single target. 1 hit. Can cause Break. Agile Mask effect fills 20% of the target's Break Bar. Moves the Bestial Wheel Pointer by 4 positions. When used while the pointer is on Agile Mask or Omnipotent Mask, fills the enemy's Break Bar by 20% on hit.
Prerequisite: Defeat and acquire the foot of a Ramasseur enemy while Monoco is in the active group.

monoco-rocher-hammering.name: Rocher Hammering
monoco-rocher-hammering.description:
Rock hammering attack. Effect: Deals medium Physical damage to a single target. 4 hits. Can cause Break. Heavy Mask modifier provides increased damage. Advances the Bestial Wheel Pointer by 3 positions and gains enhanced damage when used on Heavy Mask or Omnipotent Mask.
Prerequisite: Defeat and acquire the foot of a Rocher enemy while Monoco is in the active group.

monoco-sakapatate-estoc.name: Sakapatate Estoc
monoco-sakapatate-estoc.description:
Estoc thrusting attack. Effect: Deals low Lightning damage to a single target. 1 hit. Deals more damage if the target is Stunned. Balanced Mask: Increased damage.
Prerequisite: Defeat and acquire the foot of a Ranger Sakapatate enemy while Monoco is in the active group.

monoco-sakapatate-explosion.name: Sakapatate Explosion
monoco-sakapatate-explosion.description:
Explosive attack. Effect: Deals medium Lightning damage to random enemies. 3 hits. Critical hits trigger an additional hit. Conjurer Mask: Increased damage.
Prerequisite: Defeat and acquire the foot of a Catapult Sakapatate enemy while Monoco is in the active group.

monoco-sakapatate-fire.name: Sakapatate Fire
monoco-sakapatate-fire.description:
Fire-based attack. Effect: Deals extreme Fire damage to all enemies. 3 hits. Applies 3 Burns per hit (9 total possible). Omnipotent Mask: Increased damage. Bestial Wheel: +1 position. Optimal combo: Sakapatate Fire  Sapling Absorption  intermediate skill  Sakapatate Fire.
Prerequisite: Defeat and acquire the foot of an Ultimate Sakapatate enemy while Monoco is in the active group.

monoco-sakapatate-slam.name: Sakapatate Slam
monoco-sakapatate-slam.description:
Powerful slamming attack. Effect: Deals high Physical damage to all enemies. 1 hit. Increased damage against Marked targets. Heavy Mask or Omnipotent: Increased damage. Bestial Wheel: +5 positions.
Prerequisite: Defeat and acquire the foot of a Robust Sakapatate enemy while Monoco is in the active group.

monoco-sanctuary.name: Sanctuary
monoco-sanctuary.description:
Creates protective sanctuary. Effect: Gradient Skill (2 charges). Grants 2 Shields and applies Regeneration to all allies for 3 turns. Doesn't consume turn.
Prerequisite: Reach Relationship Level 4 with Monoco.

monoco-sapling-absorption.name: Sapling Absorption
monoco-sapling-absorption.description:
Absorbs energy like a sapling. Effect: Deals high Darkness damage. 3 hits. Recovers 5% HP per hit (10% on Conjurer Mask or Omnipotent). Bestial Wheel: +5 positions.
Prerequisite: Defeat and acquire the foot of a Sapling enemy while Monoco is in the active group.

monoco-stalact-punches.name: Stalact Punches
monoco-stalact-punches.description:
Stalactite-like punching attacks. Effect: Deals medium Ice damage to a single target. 4 hits. High Break damage. Heavy Mask or Omnipotent: Increased damage. Bestial Wheel: +4 positions.
Prerequisite: Monoco's starting skill upon joining the group, no prerequisite required.

monoco-troubadour-trumpet.name: Troubadour Trumpet
monoco-troubadour-trumpet.description:
Trumpet sound attack. Effect: Applies 1 random buff to 1-3 allies (Empowered, Protected, Shielded, Regeneration or Hastened). Conjurer Mask or Omnipotent: applies 2 random buffs per ally. Bestial Wheel: +4 positions.
Prerequisite: Defeat and acquire the foot of a Troubadour enemy while Monoco is in the active group.

items.title: Items
items.itemExists: An item with this name already exists.

masterEditing.title: The master is editing your sheet

pendingStatus.title: Pending effects
pendingStatus.message: Resolve the effects below before performing your actions this turn.

statusDescriptions.Frozen: Cannot perform actions. Each 1d6 value reduces freezing by 1. Receiving an attack removes all freezing.
statusDescriptions.Shielded: Each shield completely negates one attack.
statusDescriptions.Burning: Deals damage at the start of turn. Each burn deals 1d6 damage.
statusDescriptions.Regeneration: Restores a percentage of your life each turn.
statusDescriptions.Cursed: Dies when the counter reaches zero.
statusDescriptions.Stunned: Prevents the character from acting this turn.
statusDescriptions.Confused: Your character must do what the master says. You have the right to a resistance test at the start of each turn.
statusDescriptions.Entangled: Cannot dodge attacks, only parry, gradient parry or jump.
statusDescriptions.Exhausted: Any action that costs MP costs 1 more and characters cannot recover MP in any way.
statusDescriptions.Frenzy: The character has +1 per frenzy in attack tests (except free shot).
statusDescriptions.Rage: You are entitled to an extra basic attack action, in addition to your other actions.
statusDescriptions.Inverted: When receiving healing from any effect, takes damage instead of healing.
statusDescriptions.Marked: The character has Loss on their next Defense test.
statusDescriptions.Plagued: The character has 5 maximum HP until the end of the scene. This condition can stack, reducing 5 HP per stack, until the character has a minimum of 1 maximum HP.
statusDescriptions.Dizzy: Loss on attacks using free shot or skills.
statusDescriptions.Fragile: Taking damage greater than twice your resistance makes you fragile. While fragile you are vulnerable to breaking.
statusDescriptions.Fleeing: The character is trying to flee the battle and cannot perform any other action.
statusDescriptions.FireVulnerability: The character takes increased damage from Fire attacks.
statusDescriptions.Guardian: Protects allies by taking damage in their place when they are attacked.
statusDescriptions.Foretell: Each Foretell stack increases damage dealt by Sciel. Consumed by certain skills.
statusDescriptions.Twilight: Mystical state of Sciel that grants +150% damage, double Foretell inflicted (up to 40 maximum) and prevents Sun/Moon charge gain. Activated when having at least 1 Sun charge and 1 Moon charge simultaneously.
statusDescriptions.Powerless: The character cannot use skills or deal damage.
statusDescriptions.Rush: Increases the character's speed and attack capability.
statusDescriptions.Burn: Deals continuous fire damage to the character.
statusDescriptions.Mark: Marks the target to receive increased damage.
statusDescriptions.GreaterRush: Enhanced version of Rush, with stronger effects.
statusDescriptions.GreaterSlow: Enhanced version of Slow, with stronger effects.
statusDescriptions.EnfeeblingMark: Mark that weakens the target, reducing their power.
statusDescriptions.DamageReduction: Reduces damage taken from all sources.
statusDescriptions.SuccessiveParry: Improves ability to parry consecutive attacks.
statusDescriptions.Vulnerable: The character takes increased damage from all sources.
statusDescriptions.DoubleDamage: The next attack deals double damage.
statusDescriptions.Defenceless: The character cannot defend against attacks.
statusDescriptions.Curse: Curse that causes continuous negative effects.
statusDescriptions.invisibleBarrier: Invisible magical barrier that protects the character. Visible only to the master.
